text: Fast & Furious 7 is a 2015 American action-thriller movie. It is the seventh film in The Fast and the Furious media franchise series. Jordana Brewster plays Mia. Michelle Rodriguez plays Letty Ortiz. Vin Diesel plays Dominic Toretto. Paul Walker plays Brian O'Conner. Jason Statham plays Deckard Shaw. The movie was released on April 3, 2015. == Cast == * Vin Diesel as Dominic Toretto * Paul Walker as Brian O'Conner ** Caleb and Cody Walker * Dwayne Johnson as Luke Hobbs * Michelle Rodriguez as Letty Ortiz * Tyrese Gibson as Roman Pearce * Chris "Ludacris" Bridges as Tej Parker * Jordana Brewster as Mia Toretto == Other websites == * Category:2015 action movies Category:2015 thriller movies Category:Fast & Furious movies Category:American sequel movies Category:2010s chase movies
title: Furious 7
